title: Episode 24: Esther O'Reilly Debates Deconstruction
description:
Today I re-release a conversation originally posted on Randos United. About a year ago I had a conversation with my friend Esther about deconstruction and I felt like it fit well with the conversations with I've been having with others. I hope you enjoy! 

Esther's Article: https://www.patheos.com/blogs/youngfogey/2020/02/5-lessons-from-rhett-and-links-spiritual-deconstruction/
Paul's video about Rhett and Link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wnhFcdpt0oQ
Rando's video about Rhett and Link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=odhQKbFly0s
